name: Commander Cherry for Kinect
description:
TAKE A PHOTO OF YOUR BODY YOU CAN WALK ON!

Welcome aboard, cadet! 
Help Commander Cherry on his adventure and get creative with your body! 

You play the game using Kinect and a gamepad simultaneously. 

Play solo or coop with a friend!

La versione scaricabile di questo gioco supporta inglese.

The downloadable version of this game supports English..
